card.name: Falling Sparks
card.text: Converge — Falling Sparks deals damage to each creature and planeswalker equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell. You gain that much life.

card.name: Soul Splintering
card.text: Exile target creature. You create a tapped X/X white and silver Icon enchantment creature token, where X is that creature’s power. Then that creature’s controller does the same.

card.name: Towing Steladiuys
card.text: Menace 1I/B, Discard this: Draw a card. Each opponent loses 1 life. Until the end of your opponents next turn, opponents play with the top card of their library revealed.

card.name: Information Recovery Crew
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, look at the top two cards of your library. You may put one of them into your hand. If you do, put a card from your hand on top of your library.

card.name: Exuberant Archaeologist
card.text: Flash When this creature enters the battlefield, exile up to one target nonland card from a graveyard. 3I: Turn the exiled card face down. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Tepid Tamer
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, create a 1/1 silver Drake creature token with flying that’s tapped and attacking. Sacrifice it at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Striking Reflection
card.text: Whenever Striking Reflection attacks, you may have the size of another target creature you control become 3/2 until end of turn.

card.name: Unbothered Alchemist
card.text: When this creature enters, create a trace of Alchemist’s Vial in your hand. (Its an artifact that costs {2} with, “When this artifact enters, draw a card” and “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature can’t attack or block this turn.”)

card.name: Scouting Party
card.text: First strike Healing 3 (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain 3 life.) Channel — {2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Fault card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Back to Market
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Center Mass
card.text: This spell deals 1 damage to any target. Surveil 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Murky Politics
card.text: Target creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Memory Restored
card.text: Return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control that has mana value 5. It enters as a kindred enchantment with its creature types.

card.name: Neverbloom
card.text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Whenever a land enters under your control for the second time each turn, blank up to one target nonland permanent until your next turn. (It loses all abilities.)

card.name: The Lost Heir
card.text: Protection from planeswalkers Once each turn, if an opponent would cast a spell from anywhere other than their hand or reveal a card from their sanctum, draw a card.

card.name: Unveiling
card.text: Choose one, then choose another for each card named Unveiling in your graveyard. • Blank up to one target nonland permanent until your next turn. (It loses all abilities until your next turn.) • Draw a card from your sanctum or library. • Counter up to one target activated or triggered ability. • Create a 1/1 silver Elemental creature token with flying and another with lifelink.

card.name: To Survive in Some Form
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control has size 3/2 and gains “When this creature dies, create a token copy of it with size 3/2.”

card.name: Eschewer of Form
card.text: Flying Whenever Eschewer of Form deals combat damage to a player, you may embrace a card with a creature type from your hand. If you do, draw a card. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that a source you control that shares a creature type with it dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Era, Hymn to Creation
card.text: Luminous (If you control four or more permanents of a color, illuminate that color this game.) Flying, ward {2} Era isn’t a creature unless you’ve illuminated silver. Whenever a token you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Infraruin Predator
card.text: Trample, reach {I}, Sacrifice an artifact and an enchantment: Return Infraruin Predator from your graveyard to the battlefield. activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Sealed Deepborn
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may liberate target creature or token you control. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Kaiju Sighting
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap any number of nonland permanents you control. Create an X/X silver Fish creature token, where X is the number of permanents you tapped.

card.name: Interstellar Traveller
card.text: Flying When Interstellar Traveller enters, if it was cast, create a token that’s a copy of target nonenchantment permanent, except it’s an enchantment. (It loses its other types.)

card.name: The Depths Talk Loudly
card.text: When The Depths Talk Loudly enters, create a 2/2 silver Horror creature token with decayed. (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Whenever one or more tokens you control deal combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice The Depths Talk Loudly. If you do, draw two cards.

card.name: Lost in Dreams of Life
card.text: Exchange your library and sanctum. For the rest of the game, if you would draw a card, you draft a card from your sanctum instead. (Look at three random cards from your sanctum. Put one into your hand.)

card.name: Iridescent Summit
card.text: Pathbound—1II. Activate only if you have no cards in your graveyard with mana value 2 or 3. (As a sorcery, reveal this, then put this on top of your library from your sanctum by paying its pathbound cost.) At the beginning of your end step, you may exile target card from your graveyard with mana value 4 or greater. If you do, create a trace of that card into your hand.

card.name: One Last Sunset
card.text: Exile target permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step. When you do, that permanent deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Winged Turtle
card.text: Flying When Winged Turtle enters, mirror a non-Turtle. Whenever you create a token that doesn’t share a name with a token you control, you may exile Winged Turtle, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Wandering Dislocation
card.text: Pathbound—1I. Activate only if a card that shares a creature type with this dealt damage to an opponent this turn. (As a sorcery, reveal this, then put this on top of your library from your sanctum by paying its pathbound cost.) Flying Whenever this creature attacks, sift 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your sanctum.)

card.name: Sundown
card.text: Pathbound {2}, Activate only if there are no other cards in your sanctum. (As a sorcery, reveal this, then put this on top of your library from your sanctum by paying its pathbound cost.) Discard your hand, then draw three cards.

card.name: Against the Night
card.text: Draw a card from your sanctum or library. Surveil X, where X is the number of cards named Against the Night in your graveyard. Conjure three Against the Nights into your deck, then shuffle.

card.name: Warping Wolf
card.text: When this creature attacks, exile up to one target creature card from your graveyard. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. When you do, it enters as an enchantment with materialize X, where X is its mana value. (It loses all other creature and card types.)

card.name: Risen Earthdragon
card.text: This spell costs {1} less for each land you control. Flying When this creature enters, if it was cast, mirror twice. (Create a token thats a copy of a token you control.)

card.name: Shell's Scraping
card.text: Create two 1/1 silver Horror creature tokens with changeling. (They’re every creature type.) This spell deals damage to any target equal to the number of tokens you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

card.name: Illuminant Spire
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Illuminant Spire: Search your library for an Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Ivory Spire
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Ivory Spire: Search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Searing Spire
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Searing Spire: Search your library for a Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Silent Spire
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Silent Spire: Search your library for a Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Twisted Spire
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Twisted Spire: Search your library for a Fault card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Verdant Spire
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Verdant Spire: Search your library for a Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Swirling Moon
card.text: Nonbasic lands are Faults in addition to their other types. Whenever a nonbasic land becomes tapped, if it wasn’t tapped for {I}, put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Sever the Oracle
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Untap up to two lands.

card.name: Curious Dexteria
card.text: Protection from artifacts and from enchantments. (This creature can’t be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or equipped by artifacts or enchantments..) Whenever an opponent casts an artifact or enchantment spell, draw a card unless they pay {1}.

card.name: Searing Sigils
card.text: When Searing Sigils enters, up to one target creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Distant Vulture
card.text: 2II —

card.name: Extant Surveyor
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, put up to one target card in a graveyard into its owner’s sanctum. If it was an instant, sorcery, planeswalker, or battle card, create a 1/1 artifact Robot creature token.

card.name: Hopeless Summit
card.text: Create a 0/3 colorless Wall artifact creature token with defender. Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature you control with greater toughness than their base power. Flashback—3II, Tap two untapped silver creatures you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Lost Cause
card.text: When this enchantment enters, create a 1/1 Shapeshifter creature token with changeling. (It’s every creature type.) 1I, Sacrifice this enchantment. When you sacrifice this enchantment, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Sieve
card.text: Sift 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your sanctum.) Draw a card.

card.name: Draconic Reflection
card.text: Defender Tap three untapped creatures you control: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sryyn Spawner
card.text: First strike This creature can’t block. When this creature dies, create a 2/2 silver Insect Plant token with decayed. (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Algael-leael
card.text: Flash Flying When this creature enters, create a 2/2 silver Insect Plant creature token with decayed. (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Syphroid
card.text: Flash When Syphroid enters, destroy up to one target enchantment or planeswalker.

card.name: Tellavia Balwar
card.text: Defender Exile four cards from your graveyard: This creature gets +4/+0 and loses defender until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Refraction Mech

prop.notes: !designer TVP "Giant Soldier of Stone." —Giant Soldier of Stone, the Giant Soldier of Stone

card.text: Vigilance This creature gets +1/+0 for each token you control. {T}: Add {I}.

card.name: Writhing Sight
card.text: Menace Channel — 2I, Discard this: Draw two cards. Activate only if you control a token.

card.name: Xylem Attendant
card.text: 1I, {T}, Return a land you control to its owner’s hand: Create a 2/2 Insect Plant creature token with decayed. (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Clifftop Pishogue

prop.notes:
!designer TVP !gold !noborder
Once each turn, whenever you tap a Field for mana, add one mana of any color that land could produce. Fields you control enter the battlefield untapped.

card.text: Haste Other creatures you control whose base power and toughness aren’t equal have haste and can attack despite having defender.

card.name: Malevolent Knowledge
card.text: Sift 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your sanctum.) You draw a card and lose 1 life. Flashback—IB, Sacrifice a token. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Shadow Eater
card.text: When this creature enters, exile up to X target cards from among graveyards. You gain 1 life and put a +1/+1 counter on this creature for each permanent card exiled this way.

card.name: Mirrored Magic
card.text: Enchant creature or non-aura enchantment Enchanted permanent is also a creature with size 4/4. Whenever this enchantment leaves the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Siege Crossbow
The Demon Within
card.text: Target creature you control gains “When this creature deals combat damage this turn, return it to your hand and create an X/X black Demon creature token, where X is this creature’s power power.” Flashback IU (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Unending Toils
card.text: Target player reveals their sanctum. Choose a card from among that player’s sanctum and/or graveyard. That player exiles those cards. If you have no cards in your sanctum, draw a card.

card.name: Beautiful Headhuntress
card.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) When this creature enters, put a land card with a nonbasic land type from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield. Lands you control with a nonbasic land type have “{T}: Add one mana of any type.”

card.name: Wisped Wings
card.text: Flying 1I: This creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn. Channel — 1I, Discard this: Target creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Scholigaunt
card.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) When this creature enters, create two 2/2 Insect Plant creature tokens with decayed. (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Godhead's Interdiction
card.text: Turn all creatures face down. They’re colorless enchantments with “Turn this card face up any time by paying its mana cost.”

card.name: Incessant Intercession
card.text: You may cast this spell from your graveyard as long as an opponent lost life this turn. Channel — IB, Discard this: Until end of turn, target creature gets +X/-X, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Duet of Loss and Life
card.text: Escape—3I, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.) When this creature escapes, create a token that’s a copy of target creature card in your graveyard with mana value 2 or less.

card.name: Abstracted Mark
card.text: Flying Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, this creature deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Whimsy Unbound

prop.notes: !designer TVP Consider making this colorless for the up front cost also, maybe 7 mana !gold!noborder

card.text: Create a token that’s a copy of target creature card or planeswalker card in a graveyard, except it’s not legendary. Channel — IW, Discard this: Mirror. (Create a token thats a copy of a token you control.)

card.name: Sample Skimmer
card.text: Flying, haste When this creature enters, if {W} was spent to cast it, you gain 4 life. When this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card from your sanctum or library.

card.name: Sentinel of the Afterlife
card.text: Flying When this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, that player discards a card. If you control two or more other Zombies and/or Spirits, draw a card.

card.name: Our Fates Change
card.text: Mirror. When you do, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target spell. You may choose new targets for it. (To mirror, create a token thats a copy of a token you control.)

card.name: Caught in the Confusion
card.text: Flash When this enchantment enters, exile up to one target spell or nonland permanent. When this enchantment is no longer on the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Madness Broadcaster
card.text: Cards you own that aren’t on the battlefield have madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for it’s madness cost or put it into your graveyard.) At the beginning of your end step, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Reflection Tender
card.text: Vigilance, menace Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

card.name: The Usurper
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, move a counter from target permanent an opponent controls onto The Usurper. This creature must be blocked if able.

card.name: The Chanter of Paths
card.text: Once each turn, whenever one or more cards leave a sanctum, each opponent loses 2 life. Once each turn, whenever one or more cards are put into a sanctum from anywhere, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Sanctuary of Nectars
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {I} or {G}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Resonance
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {I} or {W}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Moonlight
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {I} or {U}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Scales
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {I} or {B}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Journeys
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {I} or {R}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Bygone Monoliths
card.text: ({T}: Add {W} or {I}.) This land enters tapped unless it entered from exile. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Foreboding Falls
card.text: ({T}: Add {I} or {U}.) This land enters tapped unless it entered from exile. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Forbidding Spires

card.name: Suffocating Path
card.text: ({T}: Add {I} or {R}.) This land enters tapped unless it entered from exile. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Dreaded Clearing
card.text: ({T}: Add {I} or {G}.) This land enters tapped unless it entered from exile. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Mooyan Curry
card.text: Destroy target noncreature artifact or noncreature enchantment. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Yaiba Robo
card.text: Restructure 1I (If you cast this for its restructure cost, its a kindred artifact until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Blooming Peculiarity
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/-2 and has trample. When enchanted creature dies, if you controlled it, return Blooming Peculiarity to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Mark of Insanity
card.text: Target creature gets +3/-3 until end of turn. You may return a Fault you control to its owners hand rather than pay this spell’s mana cost as long as your complexity is three or greater. (Your complexity is the number of spells you’ve cast and nonland abilities you’ve activated this turn.)

card.name: Nildiver
card.text: Vigilance As long as your complexity is three or greater, Nildiver is also a creature. (Your complexity is the number of spells you’ve cast and nonland abilities you’ve activated this turn.) Materialize 4 (Tap one or more other enchantments you control with total mana value 4 or more: This also becomes an Icon creature until your next upkeep.)

card.name: Planar Boundary
card.text: As Planar Boundary enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don’t, it enters tapped. {T}: Add {I}. {T}: Add one mana of any color a land you control could produce.

card.name: Ashen Wisps
card.text: Target creature becomes silver and is an enchantment in addition to its other types until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Fyndhorn Betrayer
card.text: When Fyndhorn Betrayer enters, you may destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Groaning Lullaby
card.text: Defender If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner put it into their sanctum instead.

card.name: Moonlight Charm
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target enchantment. • Put target card in a graveyard into its owner’s sanctum. • Sift 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your sanctum and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Spiteful Coil-Servants
card.text: Defender Whenever Spiteful Coil-Servants’s toughness decreases, it deals that much damage to any noncreature target.

card.name: Ego Entwined
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature or creature spell you control and target creature or creature spell you don’t control exchange text boxes.

card.name: Reto-Polo
card.text: Enchant nonland permanent you don’t control As Reto-Polo enters choose a permanent you control. Enchanted permanent is a copy of the chosen permanent.

card.name: Identity Granter
card.text: [0]: Put a loyalty counter on Identity Granter for each enchantment you control. [-2]: Target enchantment becomes a creature in addition to its other types and has base power and base toughness each equal to its mana value.

card.name: Empty Body Practitioner
card.text: Flash When Empty Body Practitioner enters, choose one— • Counter target triggered ability. • Target creature with total power and toughness 5 or less loses all abilities.

card.name: Raging Rubigrug
card.text: This creature has haste as long as your opponent’s sanctum contains four or more cards. Whenever Raging Rubigrug becomes the target of a spell for the first time each turn, that spell’s owner reveals their sanctum. Exile a card from it. You may play cards exiled this way as long as they remain exiled.

card.name: Ferryman's Price
card.text: Choose one— • Move all counters from target permanent you don’t control to any other target permanent. • Sacrifice an artifact. When you do, draw a card and each opponent loses 3 life.

card.name: Dessigry
card.text: Unrelenting (When this creature dies, if it wasn’t a token, you may discard a card to create a token that’s a copy of it with haste.) When Dessigry enters, create a 1/1 silver Drake creature token with flying.

card.name: Woods' Procession
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control lose toughness, induct. This ability only triggers twice per turn. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “Sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform this creature.” It transforms into a 4/4 God Horror creature token that can’t block.)

card.name: Blank
card.text: Target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less loses all abilities. (This lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Edification
card.text: Choose one — • Put target enchantment into its owner’s sanctum. • Destroy target permanent without any abilities.

card.name: Canyon Crustacean
card.text: Bake (When this enters, up to one other target permanent gains its abilities until end of turn.) When this creature dies, create a trace of Fault into your hand. Fault|Basic Land – Fault ({T}: Add {I}.)

card.name: Cowering Lightbringer
card.text: As long as Cowering Lightbringer’s power is 4 or greater, its a Human Warrior and has healing 2. (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain 2 life.) (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain 2 life.) 1I: Cowering Lightbringer gets +3/-3 and you get {V}. (Spend {V} to cast copies of Vertex spells.)

card.name: Faulty Recreation
card.text: Target nonbasic permanent’s types become the types of another target permanent until end of turn.
